WRITING.TEXT: Ya, hes a weird one. But I love him. WRITING.TITLE: [OC] Erik, son of death, demigod assassin.

WRITING.TEXT: So, this here is Erik. He was chosen at a young age to become the predecessor of his father, you know, Death. He was trained in the art of stealth, killing, drowning his feelings, you know. The works. At one point in his life, Erik was tasked with hunting down and killing Ivan, a rouge demigod barbarian who was terrorizing the countryside. Erik, knowing he alone could not complete task, formed the Legends, a group of elite warriors that would fight the battle that the normies never could. Basically the avengers.
Really? Thank you so much!

WRITING.TITLE: [LFA] Da crew
WRITING.TEXT: So, this is a pretty big request. I ma asking for you to draw not one, not two, not three but SEVEN characters. And maybe a spaceship. NIGEL: Nigel is the captain of this here crew. He is technically a tabaxi swashbuckler, but in the campaign hes a smuggler. He is armed with two fire grenades (basically a molotov) and a light energy machine gun. He is missing his tail and his right arm from the elbow down is replaced with a cybernetic taser arm... thing. He is ginger, cheerful, and a pretty good pilot. RYAN: Ryan is second in command of the crew. He is a tabaxi weapons dealer. He is armed with a heavy sniper rifle and an energy pistol. He has no cybernetics, but I think he has a scar on his left eye. Ryan is in charge of the weapons systems on the ship. He is black, grumpy, and a killer shot. LILY: Lily has no status on the ship. She is a tabaxi... vlogger. Ya, I know. She has no weapons except for her floating camera, kinda like those things from Ready Player One, which can temporarily blind enemies. She is grey, stupid, and kind of useless. Now, after this point, things get a bit funky. You see, this campaign was based of this game, Faster Than Light, and all the other members of this crew are races from that game. You have been warned. VOLT: Volt is what is called a "zoltan", floaty green people that give off energy. She is armed with a medium assault rifle. She has a weird point head, and just kinda floats there. She mainly works in the engine room. Oh ya, Zoltans explode when they die. Volt is smart, suicidal, and kind of confused. MANTI: Manti is one of the race "Mantis", which are just gaint mantis'. He has no weapons except for his wickedly sharp claws. He is surprisingly nice for being a highly aggressive mantis. Manti is the operator of sheilds. Manti is deadly, sweet, and the best part of this whole campaign. C-418: C-418, or C-4, is an "Engi", extremely smart robot people. He is armed with a little energy pistol. He doesn't usually fight, but he will to protect the ship. C-4 is brilliant, cunning, and a little mean. GRANITE: Granite is what is known as a "RockMan" and its exactly what it sounds like. Big rocky bois. He is armed with a heavy eneger machine gun. He works in weapons with Ryan. Granite is big, mean, and really aggressive. This campaign was called Tabaxis In Space. That is because all the original members of the campaign were tabaxi. It takes place in the year 3209, because that's what the DM said. Cant wait to see what you crazy people of reddit can accomplish!
Ah! Killed it! Kill it with fire!
